title: 10. Engkimtithei Lalpa Leh Kan Pathian Chu
lyrics:
Doh is G
Engkimtithei Lalpa Leh Kan Pathian Chu
Engkimtithei Lalpa leh kan Pathian chu fak rawh u,
Aw ka nunna, amah fak rawh, chhandamna min petu;
Mi tinte u, a in thianghlim rawn pan r'u,
Lâwm takin amah i fak ang .

Engkim chunga rorêltu kan Lalpa chu fak rawh u,
Eng lai pawha ngilnei taka min enkawl rengtu chu;
Kan thinlung chhûng duhsâm thil zawng zawngte pawh,
Aman min ngaihtuah ṭhîn a ni.

Finna thinlung min petu kan Lalpa chu fak rawh u,
Hmangaihna kutin eng lai pawhin min chelh tlat fo thin;
Lungngaihna kârah pawh aman min hnêm fo,
A thla hnuaiah min thukru ṭhin.

Engkim keimaha awmte chu fak rawh u,
Engkim thaw thei zawng zawngte hian amah chu fak rawh u;
'Amen! ' tiin a miten lo fak rawh se,
Lâwm takin a mah i fak ang.
